entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
